post.body: isnt it great to know the young generation gets thier political view from the comedy central channel. then again it might be better then msnbc

Gil. Yes, thank you. You have proved yourself to be an idiot time and time again on these forums, you didn't need to tell us. and Corey. Try not to think too high and mighty of yourself considering you were 4 years old, still pissing in your pants when i was born. I posted the John Stewart clip simply because it was humorous. I do not solely receive my facts from comedy central. If you do not believe any of the things John Stewart is saying perhaps you should look them up. ohh man. All of you conservatives are so full of rage whenever your beliefs are questioned. Well guess what EVOLUTION IS REAL and there is no easter bunny. Sorry! Maybe you should go kill a poor defenseless animal with your shiny guns and refuse a child with cancer health care. That should brighten your day up. Turn that frown upside down!

user.username: Not THE Vault Dweller, but a Vault dweller.

post.body: yeah, he's pretty fucking funny, but it's funnier when some loon believes that we all think this way.

yeah, some people think it in a way to help others providing everyone with health care and strengthening the lower class. other people believe on stepping on people below them in the ladder to make the rich richer and the poor poorer. and some see hunted animals as poor & defenseless and others see it as useless beasts that feel no pain or terror that need to be kept under control.
Some people are jealous of those that are more successful than them and want to take their money. I can defeat any Liberal in a debate. I was graduating High School when you where born.

Oh? and did you take the short bus gil? Newsflash. This, is not a debate. I gave two examples. I am sure there are people out there who are jealous of those that are more successful than myself and want to take their money. However. I am not one of them. I am happy for people who have earned what they have but only on the condition that they attained it honestly. I think that anyone who attains anything they desire, not just money, by illegal, cruel, selfish and greedy behavior should be looked down upon.

Hmm, give everybody health care and strengthen the lower class? So, I have to pay for all of the lazy ass people out there that don't want to get a job and give more hand outs to the lower class...I say hell no. But, you probably think to tax the rich is a good plan. As for the hunting...when was the last time you ate at McDonald or was that hair dye animal tested?
